reference.title: Counting the words in all documents of a folder

section.indexterm: foldercounting markup tags in the documents it contains
foldercounting words in the documents it contains
section.p: provides a facility for counting the number of words and markup tags in all documents in a folder before and after translation. You can also perform this task for selected documents in a folder (see ).

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The folder must contain at least one document.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The folder from the Folder List window
Count Wordsâ€¦ from the Utilities menu

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p: The options and parameters are the same as described in .
Click Count to begin counting words.

section.title: Results
section.p: The results are displayed in the Word Count Results - Original window or in the Word Count Results - Translation window which are explained in .
When you close this window, you are returned to the Folder List window.
If you selected the output option File, the results are also saved in a file with the name you choose.
